instruction_set.description: Testcase 01: Ensure register page is opened
instruction_set.error_out: Testcase01: Ensure that the url /register is visited
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that the register page is visited to perform registration

instruction_set.description: Testcase 01: Ensure that the password is entered
instruction_set.error_out: Testcase01: Ensure that the password is entered in the register page
instruction_set.hint: Is the password abc@123 being entered during the registration process?

instruction_set.description: Testcase 01: Verify that confirm password is entered
instruction_set.error_out: Testcase01: Unable to detect confirm password entry abc@123
instruction_set.hint: Is the confirm password abc@123 being entered during the registration process?

instruction_set.description: Testcase 01: Verify redirects to '/login' page on successful registration
instruction_set.error_out: Testcase01: Ensure that the registration is successful and redirects to '/login'
instruction_set.hint: Are we checking if the url changes to /login after performing a registration?

instruction_set.description: Testcase 02: Re-registration
instruction_set.error_out: Testcase02: No check to ensure that the re-registration was blocked
instruction_set.hint: After re-registration, was the url validated to see if it stayed on the /register page only?

instruction_set.description: Testcase 03 : Search Box functionality - valid keyword typed in search box
instruction_set.error_out: Testcase03: code to search for item yonex is not found
instruction_set.hint: Is there code for typing in yonex in the search box ?

instruction_set.description: Testcase 03 : Search Box functionality - read search result titles
instruction_set.error_out: Testcase03: Assertion of the search result was not detected in Testcase 03
instruction_set.hint: Is there code for getting the text of displayed search results as YONEX Smash Badminton Racquet

instruction_set.description: Testcase03: Search Box functionality - invalid keyword typed in search box
instruction_set.error_out: Testcase03: searching for item Gesundheit was not found
instruction_set.hint: Is there code for typing in the text Gesundheit in the search box ?

instruction_set.description: Testcase 04 :Verify size chart link presence

instruction_set.description: Testcase 04 : Verify table header content
